argument-list.arg: Chainmail armor is one of those things that didn't really need to exist in minecraft . It's not very durable and it's pretty difficult to obtain as it can't even be crafted so what's the purpose of chainmail armor in the game? We're gonna have to go way back to 2009 to a very early version of the game's first version of minecraft. The armor was used on zombies and skeletons but the chain armor wasn't even used at all . It wasn't until in dev when armor as we now know it today was added to the game that it was finally obtainable in survival mode. The only way to get it was with mods or inventory editors. The ability to hold fire as an item was removed from the game in the actual crafting recipe. It created a sort of challenge to obtain it. It's a pretty satisfying accomplishment. Every piece of chain mail armor you get. It takes you two and a half years to get to god tier if you've reached god tier. It just makes it more expensive than iron armor. We have no idea why we need to craft it. We're trying to figure that out. We've got to think about it again. We'll try to figure it out. I'm not sure what to do.
Wearing a full set of enchanted chainmail is the ULTIMATE flex.
I got a full set of fully enchanted chainmail with mending amd thorns and everything, then i died in the end and lost it. I stopped playing on that server after that
Protection 4 chainmail armor
Unless u have an unlimited zombie exp farm
god armor chainmail is a god tier flex
